title: Annoying champion select bug

embed.description: Grab seriously instant screenshots, screen GIFs, and webpage captures. Get the free app for Windows or Mac to streamline your visual sharing and bookmarking today.

body: This has been happening way too long and it's starting to piss me off. I've lost at least 30 LP and an hour of my life because this bug throws you out of champ select. What you're seeing on the screenshot is me in champion select looking at that same screen, which clearly says 0 seconds, for about 2 minutes before it kicks me out of champion select, causing a dodge. It happens way too often, one in every 20 or so champ selects; either you can't ban, you can't pick, or you're lucky enough to have already done both, or you're last pick and everybody else takes long enough to pick that you manage to catch back up. I have no clue what causes this bug, all I know is that this has been happening since last year and it still hasn't been fixed.

replies.body:
1. Update your **DirectX**: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35
2. Try running a **Client Repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.
3. **Clean Reinstall the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).
4. If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
